item.description: I think complex circuits should be sent out for professional fabrication since its pretty cheap to do so. But you've got to test the circuit before you send it out! This means working with SMT parts... In this workshop, we can build simple break-out boards in Eagle, print them out and then fab them. See http://effluviaofasca... and http://effluviaofasca...  Please RSVP if you like the idea so we can see how much interest there is.
item.name: DIY PCB fabrication workshop
